title: Important Notes
content: This is a digital download only; no physical items will be shipped. Colors may differ based on your screen and printing method. For personal use only—commercial use or redistribution is prohibited. Need a different size or have a special request? Feel free to message me—I'm always happy to assist!
instructions: This is the base text for the 'Important Notes' section for the 4x5 aspect ratio. Edit the text to refine the message for this paragraph.
